title: Astra Channel
content: I decided to create a television channel on the concept of astronomy for the general public. lots of history and technology like space, rockets, planets, stars and more that humans haven't gotten to witness.

title: Starbucks OOH - Game
content: A project that simulates an interactive experience as if working in a gencia hired by starbucks to advertise the four largest Starbucks in Cali, is an interactive experience that combines arduino with user experience, interface design and web design.

title: H&M - Customer Journey
content: H&M is one of the most recognized fashion brands around the world, they want to bring to their customers the best experience at stores as possible.

title: Banco W
content: The Colombian bank, Banco W approached us to find ways to get closer to its customers, seeking that they have a better experience through the bank's digital channels and that they can provide them with information in a clear and precise manner.

title: BITX
content: Bitx is a website that collects information on more than 80+ cryptocurrencies. A website specialized in searching the exchange prices, price change so far and 24h volume.
